full_summary:
================================
**Tender Announcement**
-------------------

### Project Title
**English:** 5P414-220127 - Hazardous Material Storage Shed
**French:** 5P414-220127 - Remise d’entreposage de matières dangereuses

### Tender Details
#### Reference Number
WS3639888369-Doc3640064204

#### Solicitation Number
WS3639888369

#### Tender Status
**English:** The tender has expired.
**French:** L'appel d'offres est expiré.

#### Tender Description
Parks Canada Agency (PC) requires the supply, delivery, and offloading of one (1) 3-door hazardous material storage shed for Wood Buffalo National Park (WBNP). The shed must be used to store drummed helicopter fuel and all deliverables must be received on or before 31 March 2023.

#### Tender Submission Details
**Tender Closing Date:** 17 November 2022, 14:00 EST
**Bid Submission**: All required supporting documentation must be submitted by the aforementioned closing date. Bids submitted after the closing date will be declared non-responsive.

#### Terms and Conditions

* Supply, delivery, and offloading of one (1) 3-door hazardous material storage shed
* Storage of drummed helicopter fuel
* All deliverables must be received on or before 31 March 2023

#### Contacts
* Erin Kaiser (SPAC/PSPC)
* Phone: [Not Provided]
* Email: [erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14383036?extsite=MTQzODMwMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**No attachments are available for this tender.**

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Kind regards  LeagueOfOne.
